bug.author: Dicksonchin93
bug.description: I got this error in the latest master using recog_wav.sh AttributeError: 'Namespace' object has no attribute 'transformer_encoder_selfattn_layer_type' ` checking out version v.0.7.0 solved the problem, but I thought I should report this bug

comments.comment: Hi, After doing git pull origin master, i am still getting the same error. What should I do to fix it? thanks!
I could not reproduce with the current master. Could you share the snippet to reproduce your error?

hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kan-bayashi>@kan-bayashi</denchmark-link>
Sorry, I solved the error. I didn't set up the environment correctly (I did ).
